attributes.action: Stop spending millions in Foreign Aid to third world countries when our fellow countrymen and women suffering from Cancer are denied life saving drugs to alleviate their condition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.creator_name: Michael Charles Pavitt.RAF and RAMC rtd.

rejection.details: We are unable to verify your statement 'our fellow countrymen and women suffering from Cancer are denied life saving drugs'.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
